plays.text: Penalty to Martin Rucinsky 2 minutes for Holding Daniel Cleary

Goal scored by Petr Cajanek assisted by Martin Rucinsky AND Radek Dvorak

Goal scored by Dallas Drake assisted by Dan Hinote
Penalty to Bryce Salvador 2 minutes for Hooking Daniel Cleary
Goal scored by Nicklas Lidstrom assisted by Robert Lang AND Mathieu Schneider
Penalty to Nicklas Lidstrom 2 minutes for Hooking Barret Jackman
Goal scored by Jason Williams assisted by Robert Lang AND Chris Chelios
Penalty to Radek Dvorak 2 minutes for Hooking Henrik Zetterberg
Penalty to Dominik Hasek 2 minutes for Delaying Game – illegal play by GoalTender(opposing player not identified) served by M

Penalty to Doug Weight 2 minutes for Hooking Henrik Zetterberg
Penalty to Dennis Wideman 2 minutes for Delaying Game – Puck over Glass(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Daniel Cleary assisted by Mathieu Schneider AND Nicklas Lidstrom
Penalty to Keith Tkachuk 2 minutes for Elbowing Chris Chelios
Penalty to Barret Jackman 2 minutes for Tripping Valtteri Filppula
Penalty to Tomas Holmstrom 2 minutes for Interference Dan Hinote
Penalty to Mikael Samuelsson 2 minutes for Holding Christian Backman
Goal scored by Pavel Datsyuk unassisted
